DataElement.preferredName: CoPaQ Incurred Expenses for Purchase of Medical Devices Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Yes/No indicator of whether patient incurred expenses for medical devices.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Cost for Patients Questionnaire Incurred Expenses for Purchase of Medical Devices
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A questionnaire designed to assess an individual's expenses as a result of their state of health. It includes questions about out-of-pocket costs, time required for travel or for booking medical services, and loss of income.:A question about whether an individual incurred expenses for the purchase of medical devices.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did you incur expenses for the purchase of any medical devices?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Alliance CRF Text 1
